page.title: 14Life of a family
page.content: We are a family of six. Four boys and parents . During the week we had the following meals for dinner: Saturday.Fish and chips. Sunday .Roast pork. Monday. We had fish and chips with peas. Tuesday. We had fish and chips for dinner. Wednesday.We had chips,baked beans and fishfingers. Thursday. We had beef burgers and baked beans and went shopping. Friday. We stayed home and we had baked beans fishfingers and potatoes. For breakfast we have toast, a cup of coffee and cereals, porridge and cornflakes.In the week two of us were at school and took sandwiches, liver sausage,packet of crisps and a drink of blackcurrant.One brother remained at home,the other worked.
